SELECT /* COCodeMapper.getCdIdList */
A.CD_ID , A.CD , A.CD_NM , A.LFT_VAL , A.RHT_VAL , DPTH
FROM co_code_mst A, (SELECT LFT_VAL, RHT_VAL FROM co_code_mst WHERE CD = #{cd}) B
WHERE 1=1 AND A.LFT_VAL >= B.LFT_VAL AND A.RHT_VAL <= B.RHT_VAL AND CD != #{cd} AND DPTH > 0

SELECT /* COCodeMapper.getCdIdPrntList */ A.CD_ID , A.CD , A.CD_NM , A.LFT_VAL , A.RHT_VAL , DPTH FROM co_code_mst A, (SELECT LFT_VAL, RHT_VAL FROM co_code_mst WHERE CD = #{cd}) B
WHERE 1=1 AND A.LFT_VAL <= B.LFT_VAL AND A.RHT_VAL >= B.RHT_VAL AND DPTH > 0
